jobDescription: Design and deliver MVAC cooling solutions for mission-critical data center projects.  Involves mechanical design, using Revit and CAD, performing calculations (CFD, cooling load, hydraulic), preparing reports and specifications, and collaborating with architects and other engineers.
preferredQualifications: State Level Common Engg. Entrance Exam Rank < 20,000 or >60% Percentile
75% aggregate in all academics (SSC/Xth, Inter/XIIth, & B.Tech. / BE)
